Retrieves budget details based on business unit, budget type, year, start period from and end period.

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The customer id of the budget item to retrieve.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the budget item to retrieve.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year of the budget item to retrieve.

parameters.name: periodFrom
parameters.description: The start period of the budget item to retrieve.

parameters.name: periodTo
parameters.description: The end period of the budget item to retrieve.

parameters.name: showPreviousYearOutcome
parameters.description: Whether to show the previous year outcome.

get.summary: Retrieves budget items per year
Gets the budgettype based on the physical number
Returns a list of all business units
Returns list of banks based on businessUnitId
Retrieves cashflow details based on the provided cashflow ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cashflow item to retrieve.

post.summary: Creates a cashflow item with no recurrence

Creates a cashflow item with weekly recurrence.
WeekDay: 1 = Monday, 2 = Tuesday, 3 = Wednesday, 4 = Thursday, 5 = Friday (Saturday and Sunday are not allowed)
WeeklyRecurrence: 1-4 (number of weeks between occurrences: 1 = every week, 2 = every 2 weeks, etc.)

Creates or updates a monthly cashflow for the X-th day of every Y months.
DayOfMonth: 1-31 (the specific day of the month for the recurrence)
MonthRecurrence: 1-24 (number of months between occurrences)

Creates or updates one cashflow item for the N-th occurrence of [Weekday] in every Y months.
WeeklyRecurrence: 1 = first, 2 = second, 3 = third, 4 = fourth, 5 = last
WeekDay: 1 = Week day (any weekday), 2 = Monday, 3 = Tuesday, 4 = Wednesday, 5 = Thursday, 6 = Friday (Saturday and Sunday are not allowed)
MonthRecurrence: 1-24 (number of months between occurrences)

get.summary: Gets the list of containers for a year with start and end periods
Gets the list of containers based on the year number and type
Gets the list of containers based on the year number, type, start period and end period
Gets the list of containers based on the type

post.summary:
Gets the list of containers based on advanced filter criteria

Supported operators:
- Equal: Exact match
- Include: IN operation with comma-separated values (e.g., "SALES,MARKETING,ADMIN")
- Between: Range between two values (requires secondValue)
- GreaterThan: Greater than comparison
- LessThan: Less than comparison

requestBody.description: Filter criteria including field names, operators, and values

post.summary:
Creates a supplier ledger with the default (autogenerated) accounting data, creates period allocations for rows and preliminary
fixed assets if a fixed asset is used. For changing an existing supplier ledger Invno parameter must have a greater than 0 value.

Creates a supplier ledger with the provided accounting data (check the parameters- Voucher rows), creates period allocations for rows and preliminary
fixed assets if a fixed asset is used. For changing an existing supplier ledger Invno parameter must have a greater than 0 value.

Creates a customer ledger with the provided accounting data (check the parameters- Voucher rows), creates period allocations for rows and preliminary
fixed assets if a fixed asset is used. For changing an existing supplier ledger Invno parameter must have a greater than 0 value.
Creates a customer ledger with the default (autogenerated) accounting data.
Blocks or unblocks the payments for an existing supplier ledger

requestBody.description: Details of the supplier ledger that will be blocked or unblocked
